content.query:
SELECT count([Claim_id]) count_claims
,YEAR([created]) claim_year
,[patient_display]
,[patient_id_reference]
 FROM [ext].[Claim_main]
 group by YEAR([created]) 
,[patient_display]
,[patient_id_reference]

with claims as (
SELECT [Claim_id]
,[created]
,[patient_id_reference]
 FROM [ext].[Claim_main]
 where YEAR([created]) > 2020
)


SELECT count([Claim_id]) count_claims
,YEAR([created]) claim_year
,[patient_display]
,[patient_id_reference]
 FROM [ext].[Claim_main]
 group by YEAR([created]) 
,[patient_display]
,[patient_id_reference]
